title: How are products selected for this marketplace?
content: We feature a mix of trending, highly-rated, and innovative SaaS products in AI and web development. Our team evaluates tools based on functionality, user reviews, and relevance to our audience.

title: How do the affiliate links work?
content: When you click on a product link and make a purchase, we may earn a small commission at no extra cost to you. This helps support our platform and allows us to continue providing curated lists and reviews.

title: Are the reviews biased?
content: We strive for objective reviews. While we earn commissions, our primary goal is to help you find the best tools. We highlight both pros and cons and encourage community feedback.

title: Can I suggest a SaaS product to feature?
content: Absolutely! We welcome suggestions from our community. Please use our contact form or suggestion link to recommend a product.
